hideother.helpText: hide from players seeing this plot what characters and players it is about.

content.helpText: link to a specific group / character / an application player profile: input @ and start typing a name from the «About» field selections, then input space. The text before brackets will be visible as a link to the object in the story description.

code.helpText: the more the number the earlier information is shown in plots list.

todo.helpText: if any text is present, plot and all of its stories are hidden from players.
